# Storage

The basic interface for key/value persistence in the XYO protocol. Provides two reference implementations that implement this protocol:

- in-memory
- file-storage

## Install

Using yarn

```sh
  yarn add @xyo-network/storage
```

Using npm

```sh
  npm install @xyo-network/storage --save
```
